sentences.en: Dr Barrasso, an orthopaedic surgeon by training, calls this the "second-opinion" strategy.
sentences.cn: 一位职业整形外科医师巴拉索称此为“第二意见”策略。

sentences.en: By chance, the father of one of Mr Welles's college friends was a prominent orthopaedic surgeon.
sentences.cn: 碰巧，维利斯先生一个大学同学的父亲是有名的整形外科医生。

sentences.en: The American Academy of Orthopaedic Surgeons offers these Suggestions to care properly for a cast or splint.
sentences.cn: 美国矫形外科医生学会为如何恰当照料夹板提出了一些建议？
